mdRecord.dcterms:description: This letter, on Sigma Nu Fraternity letterhead is from Bill Amiott, Associate Executive Secretary, to Mrs. Wood. The date is October 12, 1972. He writes that he has heard that one of her rose bushes did not survive the winter and he offers her "a shoot from the plant you gave us, with our best wishes that it will thrive and will bring you pleasure."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter Offering Rose Cuttings to Mrs. Wood, October 12, 1972 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Roses
Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
Sigma Nu
